img_above_text:
Once you drop down a ledge, you can find a series of ledges along the cliff to the right with a green Wisp at the edge, and can even see an ominous bridge in the distance.
Head back up the ledges to find an end to the tunnel where a grassy path is filled with cocoons all over the place.
img_below_text:
One particularly large cocoon seems to be grunting, but it's not the return of the Venom Daoist. Instead, give it a wack to find your old pal the Horse Guai on the next part of his adventure!
![Wukong MiddleHollow 50.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/76/Wukong_MiddleHollow_50.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 47 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "Once you drop down a ledge, you can find a series of ledges along the cliff to the right with a green Wisp at the edge, and can even see an ominous bridge in the distance.
Head back up the ledges to find an end to the tunnel where a grassy path is filled with cocoons all over the place."
            - Following Text: "One particularly large cocoon seems to be grunting, but it's not the return of the Venom Daoist. Instead, give it a wack to find your old pal the Horse Guai on the next part of his adventure!
![Wukong MiddleHollow 50.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/76/Wukong_MiddleHollow_50.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a character standing in a dark, cavernous area filled with cocoons and webs. The character is holding a glowing weapon and is facing a large cocoon marked with a red arrow, indicating its significance. The preceding text describes a journey through ledges and tunnels leading to a grassy path filled with cocoons, while the following text reveals that interacting with the large cocoon will introduce the Horse Guai character. The image serves to highlight the moment before the player discovers the Horse Guai within the large cocoon.
